overview: Watercraft Mix offers professional boat export services from the United States to anywhere around the globe. We are able to containerize boats up to 28ft long and 8.6ft wide! This process is done by fabricating custom-designed frames for every boat enabling us to place it inside of the container at a certain angle depending on the boats specifications. Our export packing method reduces international shipping coasts and makes boat purchases in the U.S more affordable. Our clientele range from domestic and international boat dealers as well as individual owners.
